product_name: Rossignol Fun Girl J4 Ski Boots - Junior Girls' - 2012/2013
long_description: Rossignol Comp J4 ski boots are a great choice for girls developing their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features. Anatomic inner boots conform to the shape of girls' feet, ensuring all-day comfort. Bi-injected polyolefin shells are lightweight and easy to manage. Liners use anatomic, molded foam to increase warmth and comfort. The Rossignol Comp J4 boots feature 4 buckles, a high cuff for longer legs and a 60 flex index, an easy flex appropriate for junior skiers.
short_description: Rossignol Comp J4 ski boots are a great choice for girls developing their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features.
